scripts.start-pub: set PUBSUB_PUB=true && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port=8000
scripts.start-sub: set PUBSUB_PUB=false && poetry run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --port=8001
scripts.set-reqs: poetry lock && poetry export -f requirements.txt --output requirements.txt --without-hashes
